heading: Multiplication of Fractions and practice reducing fractions to the lowest terms.

topics.heading: Multiplication of Fractions and practice reducing fractions to the lowest terms.

questions.question: Luna enchanted a spell using 21/27 of her magic power. What is this fraction simplified to?

Merlin and Luna decided to brew a powerful potion using their newfound knowledge of fractions. They needed to mix 8/3 of a rare elixir with 5/7 of a mystical essence. Find what fraction of the total mixture they used.
Merlin and Luna needed to enhance their potion's effectiveness. They decided to multiply 31/17 of dragon scales with 41/15 of unicorn hair. What fraction of the total mixture does this represent?
Merlin mixed 8/3 of a potion with 9/5 of another. What is the resulting fraction?
Luna discovered 18/44 of a rare herb. What is this fraction reduced to?
Luna enchanted a shield using 95/50 of her power. What is this fraction simplified to?
Merlin cast a spell using 84/36 of his magic. What is this fraction simplified to?
Merlin and Luna are preparing another potion. They decided to mix 13/15 of unicorn hair with 17/19 of centaur tears. What fraction will they get on multiplying both potion?
Merlin and Luna brewed a healing potion using 48/56 of their magic herbs. What is this fraction reduced to?
Merlin mixed 65/95 of a potion. What is this fraction reduced to?
Luna created a charm using 30/17 of a starlight essence and 16/11 of a moonbeam essence. What fraction of the charm's power does this represent?
Luna enchanted a shield using 15/6 of her magic energy and 4/19 of her elemental power. What is the multiplication result of the enchanted shield's strength?
What is 15/19 times 15/14, a multiplication problem Merlin and Luna tackled?
What is the product of 47/19 and 5/10, as calculated by Merlin and Luna?
Merlin and Luna simplified 112/98 to its lowest terms. What is the simplified form?
Merlin and Luna brewed a potion using 50/90 of their magical ingredients. What is the resulting fraction of the potion's power?
What is 13/14 times 16/15, a spell Merlin and Luna mastered?
Merlin and Luna simplified 232/108 to its lowest terms. What is the simplified form?
What is 13/12 times 17/22, a multiplication challenge faced by Merlin and Luna?
What is 33/11 times 15/22, a fraction product that Merlin and Luna calculated?
